issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
This is not a Regression as the issue exists atleast as far back as 3.2.3.GA

Steps to Reproduce:
1. In Appcelerator Studio, create a new project with services enabled
2. Go to Run As > iTunes Sync

Actual Result:
The project build successfully and synced to iTunes but an error alert is shown in Studio related to "Uploading debug symbols has encountered a problem". Check the attached screenshot.

Expected Result:
The error should not be shown
fields.summary: iOS: Project with services enabled shows error when Run for iTunes Sync

comments.body: Closing as iTunes Sync is no longer available as of iTunes update (12.7).
